alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Dallas; Elmore; Lowndes; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 9:44PM CDT until April 08 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River At Montgomery affecting Lowndes, Montgomery, Elmore, Dallas and Autauga Counties. .Heavy rainfall today combined with gate operations at Martin Dam will produce significant rises along the Alabama River basin. A Flood Warning is now in effect for the Alabama River At Montgomery. Another statement will be issued by Wednesday afternoon, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River At Montgomery. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, Extensive flooding of low lands in the area occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 27.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 36.5 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
